successes.title: 3Doodler 2.0: The World’s First 3D Printing Pen, Reinvented
successes.description: The world’s first and best 3D printing pen just got even better.           Lift your imagination off the page all over again!

Pledges.description: JOIN THE COMMUNITY: Thanks for your contribution! Even if you aren’t backing a 3Doodler pen, you can still be part of this community, get project Updates, and make the Hall of Fame on our website. This pledge level has no physical reward.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: Too good to be true! 
+ 1 new 3Doodler 2.0 pen (from the 1st 100!) 
+ 4 packs of 25 strands of plastic
+ A Hall of Fame mention
Limit of 1 per backer.

DAY 1 COMMUNITY SPECIAL: For one
day only, a shout-out to our amazing
community! We wouldn't be here
without you! 
+ 1 new 3Doodler 2.0 pen 
+ 4 packs of 25 strands of plastic
+ A Hall of Fame mention
Limit of 1 per backer.

3DOODLER 2.0: Pen + Plastics!
+ 1 new 3Doodler 2.0 pen 
+ 4 packs of 25 strands of plastic
+ A Hall of Fame mention
Limit of 1 per backer.

ACCESSORIZE: DoodleStand + Nozzles!
+ 1 new 3Doodler 2.0 pen
+ 4 packs of 25 strands of plastic
+ 1 DoodleStand
+ 1 Nozzle Set
+ A Hall of Fame mention
Limit of 1 per backer.

JETSETTER: 3Doodle on the go! 
+ 1 new 3Doodler 2.0 pen
+ 4 packs of 25 strands of plastic 
+ 1 JetPack
+ A Hall of Fame mention 
Limit of 1 per backer.

SUPERDOODLER: DoodleStand + Nozzle Set + JetPack
+ 1 new 3Doodler 2.0 pen
+ 4 packs of 25 strands of plastic
+ 1 DoodleStand 
+ 1 Nozzle Set 
+ 1 JetPack
+ A Hall of Fame mention
Limit of 1 per backer.

POWERDOODLER: Get it all!
+ 1 new 3Doodler 2.0 pen
+ 4 packs of 25 strands of plastic
+ 1 DoodleStand 
+ 1 Nozzle Set 
+ 1 Pedal 
+ 1 JetPack
+ A Hall of Fame mention
Limit of 1 per backer.

DOUBLE YO' 3DOODLER 2.0: 
+ 2 new 3Doodler 2.0 pens
+ 8 packs of 25 strands of plastic 
+ A Hall of Fame mention 
Limit of 1 per backer.

DOUBLE ACCESSORIZE: 
+ 2 new 3Doodler 2.0 pens
+ 8 packs of 25 strands of plastic 
+ 2 DoodleStands
+ 2 Nozzle Sets
+ A Hall of Fame mention 
Limit of 1 per backer.

BLING BLING!

Note: Gold colored, not gold plated!
